1370: Siccone was born in Marcktgang in 1370.
Got married to Ghodelde at age 24 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Ghodelde, at age 25.
1372: Had a son with Ghodelde, Dammas, at age 26.
1374: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Lelien, at age 28.
1376: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Sipper, at age 30.
1377: Had a son with Ghodelde, Wolbrand, at age 31.
1382: Had a son with Ghodelde, Harlo, at age 36.
1383: Lost son Harlo when Harlo was 2 years old.
1385: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Sara, at age 39.
1387: Lost son Wolbrand when Wolbrand was 11 years old.
1388: Had a son with Ghodelde, Richolfus, at age 42.
1389: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Hodine, at age 43.
Lost daughter Lelien when Lelien was 16 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
